    • Method Detail

      • splitPrefix

        public static void splitPrefix(String source,
               char separator,
               StringBuffer prefix,
               StringBuffer suffix)
        Split a string at the first occurrence of a character. for example: foo:bar split at : would return foo as the prefix and bar as the suffix. The : is not returned. Used mainly for parsing tokens
        Parameters:
        source - - string to split
        separator - - character for split
        prefix - - string before the separator
        suffix - - string after the separator

      • join

        public static String join(Object[] pathParts,
          String seperator)
        Join an array of objects using their "toString" method. Each object is separated by the separator character

        Example:

        String[] input = {"the", "join", "example"}; String result = TextBuilder.join(input, ":");

        Result is "the:join:example"
        Parameters:
        pathParts - - objects to join
        seperator - - character used to separate objects
        Returns:
        String

      • join

        public static String join(Object[] pathParts,
          String seperator,
          IDelegate stringize)
        Join an array of objects using a specific method common to all objects
        Parameters:
        pathParts - - objects to join
        seperator - - character to separate object
        stringize - - Method on objects to obtain string. All objects in list must declare this method as public.
        Returns:
        String

      • join

        public static String join(List pathParts,
          String seperator)
        Join with a list using "toString" method of each object in the list
        Parameters:
        pathParts - - list of objects to join
        seperator - - character used to separate each object
        Returns:
        String
        See Also:
        join(Object[], String)

      • join

        public static String join(List pathParts,
          String seperator,
          IDelegate stringize)
        Join with a list using specific method to join
        Parameters:
        pathParts - - List of objects to join
        seperator - - character used to separate each object
        stringize - - method on object. All objects in list must declare this method as public.
        Returns:
        See Also:
        join(Object[], String, IDelegate)
